Package org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.util.stream

Class ByteBufferStream

java.lang.Object
org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.util.stream.ByteBufferStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
PrimitiveInputStream, PrimitiveOutputStream
public class ByteBufferStream extends Object implements PrimitiveInputStream, PrimitiveOutputStream
A stream-like implementation that allows serialization and deserialization of primitive types in a stream-like fashion. Internally it uses a byte buffer with a fixed capacity.
